TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FileType extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype PCSC.Iso7816.FileType Dedicated = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Dedicated file (DF) that is used for logical organization of data in the card.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype PCSC.Iso7816.FileType Elementary = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Elementary file (EF) that is used for storing data.
Docs.remarks: The data may or may not be interpreted/analyzed by the card. You need to check the extended file type .
